segments.text: Looking at the boy, I feel both amused and terrified by his adventurous spirit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on those cookies, unaware of the risk heâ€™s taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear his excitement building as he stretches for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at the same time, I feel a pang of fear for him; that stool looks ready to collapse any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there's the girl, watching eagerly, raising her hand in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they are doing this right under their mother's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous game they're playing, and I wonder if they realize the potential consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
